Kendo.Mvc.UI.Fluent.PaletteSizeBuilder

Defines the fluent interface for configuring the DatePickerBase component.

Methods

Width(System.Int32)

Set the width of the tiles

Parameters

width System.Int32

The tile width.

Height(System.Int32)

Set the height of the tiles

Parameters

width System.Int32

The tile height.
